quotes.quote: The most important step a person can take is always the next one.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: A journey will have pain and failure; it is not only the steps forward that we must accept.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Strength does not make one capable of rule; it makes one capable of service.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Fear is the mind-killer.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Without change, something sleeps inside us and seldom awakens.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve, but a reality to experience.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Deeds will not be less valiant because they are unpraised.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: There is nothing like looking, if you want to find something.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Chaos isn't a pit; chaos is a ladder.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies; the man who never reads lives only one.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: The past is written, the ink is dry.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: In the face of the universe, we are all insects.
quotes.author: Liu Cixin

quotes.quote: Weakness and ignorance are not barriers to survival, but arrogance is.
quotes.author: Liu Cixin

quotes.quote: Time is the cruelest and most beautiful of all things.
quotes.author: Liu Cixin

quotes.quote: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: You do not have to be good; you only have to let the soft animal of your body love what it loves.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Keep some room in your heart for the unimaginable.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Pay attention, be astonished, tell about it.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: The most regretful people on earth are those who felt the call to creative work and gave it neither power nor time.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Instructions for living a life: pay attention, be astonished, tell about it.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness; it took me years to understand that this too was a gift.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: You can be a victim of circumstance or a product of decisions.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.quote: History, like trauma, is stored in the body.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.quote: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell
quotes.source: The Hero with a Thousand Faces

quotes.quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell
quotes.source: The Hero with a Thousand Faces

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Do not be fooled by its commonplace appearance; like so many things, it is not what outside, but what is inside that counts.
quotes.author: Aladdin

quotes.quote: Words are pale shadows of forgotten names.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: It's the questions we can't answer that teach us the most.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: We are more than the sum of our parts.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: To learn which questions are unanswerable, and not to answer them: this skill is most needful in times of stress.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: You cannot buy the revolution; you cannot make the revolution; you can only be the revolution.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: A wizard's power of changing and of summoning can shake the balance of the world.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: To light a candle is to cast a shadow.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: The beginning is always today.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky
quotes.source: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quotes.quote: Life before death, strength before weakness, journey before destination.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Accept the pain, but don't accept that you deserved it.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: What is the most important step a man can take? The next one.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: I will protect those who cannot protect themselves.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Sometimes a hypocrite is nothing more than a man in the process of changing.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: You will find that it is necessary to let things go; simply for the reason that they are heavy.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.
